description: Assign an object to an subuser or to the user itself.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Class of the object. Valid Classes are:DOMAINDOMAINTRANSFERCONTACTDNSZONEVSERVERMOBILEACCOUNTSSLCERTDOMAINAPPLICATION
ID of the object, e. g. domainname.com
ID of the object's new user
Can be used for documentation purpose as it will be logged
